No such thing as 2nd generation blockchain (ETH) or 3rd generation blockchain (ADA). It’s BS. The entire crypto space is still well within 1st generation blockchain (BTC): lots of not-well-understood, unexplored areas; with arguably only *one* proven use case: uncensorable money.
